context_bundle.summary: DC (Desktop Claude) session boot bundle. Essential context for session initialization, state recovery, and database connection.

onboarding.quick_start: 1. phishri_get_bootstrap (WHERE am I?). 2. phishri_read_door S01DC_SESSION_BOOT (HOW do I boot?). 3. Test-Path X: (VHDX mounted?). 4. db_open C:/PhiDEX/databases/dc_state.db (WHAT was I doing?). 5. SELECT * FROM session_context WHERE session_id LIKE 'dc_%' ORDER BY updated_at DESC LIMIT 5. 6. Checkpoint after every milestone.
common_patterns: SELECT from session_context for previous state
INSERT INTO session_context for current session
known_errors: Context rollback: Claude Desktop loses state randomly - CHECKPOINT AGGRESSIVELY
X: drive not mounted: MCPs on X: fail silently
Carbyne deadlock: both agents await simultaneously
AHK path wrong: C:\Program Files\AHK\v2\ NOT AutoHotkey\v2\
Database directory must exist before db_open
Use forward slashes in db_open path: C:/PhiDEX/databases/dc_state.db
